channel.title: Screamland Development Page
channel.description:
Hello, I guess some moparscapers had seen another development page posted by me. It's still under development, and still raw. So I had made another one , that is ready. I know that mostly people will say that the base I use is most unstable base on whole RSPS world, but this is the only one I know how to code. And I know it's a shame =/
[code]Standard Server Information: Revision: 317 (wrong, because this revision is obeyed of RuneScape 2007's times) Base: AllstarScape Gameframe: 317 consumed with 474.[/code]
Details: - Godswords Godsword Stances Godsword Specials - PvP armour All pvp armours - Bosses General Graador (60% animated) Corporeal Beast - All 21 skills - Economy - Server will be online 23/7 - Not bad forums, using SMFNEW service.
What do I need: - 2 Forum Moderators. [code]Name: Age: Moderating Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):[/code] - 2 Server Moderators [code]Name: Age: Moderating Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):[/code] - 1 Coder , who can help me do quests and stuff on server. [code]Name: Age: Coding Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):[/code] - Some Supporters
Some screenshots: [center][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/SecretFiles.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/memP2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/memP1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/guilds1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/graador1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/corp1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/rsmastery20092009/KQ.jpg[/img][/center]
I won't lie and say that it's stable, but I'm sure it can hold up to 40 players! We have a hoster, you can watch properties of host at V-Nation Development Page, which will be linked below.
I please you not to hate the post, and if you can wish us a luck, don't write that anything will be successed. Last try with this source had 8 players online dialy , so I decided to try it again.
[center][b]..::[ Server Staff ]::..[/b] Developer and Coder - Ink Person (me) Owner and Hoster - Ink Legend
[b]Want to contact me?[/b] Skype: screamlord1 MSN: mod-vlad-@hotmail.com[/center]
[center]I don't remember, if it's allowed to post website/forum links, so I'd not break any rules. PM me if you want forum link.[/center]

item.title: Screamland Development Page
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

spearo:

Whats the economy going to be like? Easy leveling or Hard leveling?

I prefer it to be medium

[quote=“mr extremez, post:10, topic:401055”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=498111.msg3642965#msg3642965 date=1309152793]

NB! SOON PICTURES COMING!

Andrew^
[/quote]
Ahh i see[/quote]
Added pics , sir.

item.title: Screamland Development Page
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Hello, I guess some moparscapers had seen another development page posted by me. It’s still under development, and still raw.
So I had made another one , that is ready.
I know that mostly people will say that the base I use is most unstable base on whole RSPS world, but this is the only one I know how to code. And I know it’s a shame =/

Standard Server Information: Revision: 317 (wrong, because this revision is obeyed of RuneScape 2007's times) Base: AllstarScape Gameframe: 317 consumed with 474.

Details:

  • Godswords
    Godsword Stances
    Godsword Specials
  • PvP armour
    All pvp armours
  • Bosses
    General Graador (60% animated)
    Corporeal Beast
  • All 21 skills
  • Economy
  • Server will be online 23/7
  • Not bad forums, using SMFNEW service.

What do I need:

  • 2 Forum Moderators.

Name: Age: Moderating Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):

  • 2 Server Moderators

Name: Age: Moderating Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):

  • 1 Coder , who can help me do quests and stuff on server.

Name: Age: Coding Experience: Recommendation (just a commend by urself):

  • Some Supporters

Some screenshots:
[center]

SecretFiles.jpg764×521

[/center]

I won’t lie and say that it’s stable, but I’m sure it can hold up to 40 players!
We have a hoster, you can watch properties of host at V-Nation Development Page, which will be linked below.

I please you not to hate the post, and if you can wish us a luck, don’t write that anything will be successed.
Last try with this source had 8 players online dialy , so I decided to try it again.

[center]…::[ Server Staff ]::…
Developer and Coder - Ink Person (me)
Owner and Hoster - Ink Legend

Want to contact me?
Skype: screamlord1
MSN: mod-vlad-@hotmail.com[/center]

[center]I don’t remember, if it’s allowed to post website/forum links, so I’d not break any rules. PM me if you want forum link.[/center]
